Item ID12309

The pink boater is a piece of headwear. There are no requirements to wear it and it does not provide any bonuses when worn. Boaters can be stored in the Costume room of a player-owned house.

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Tier Emotes STASH Location Items Cost
Master Wave Northern wall of Castle Drakan, by the sickle marking on the floor 334,933[c 1]
  1. ^ The cost may be higher because of the variant of the item used. The base item is boater.

The '''pink boater''' is a piece of headwear. There are no requirements to wear it and it does not provide any bonuses when worn. Boaters can be stored in the [[Costume room]] of a [[player-owned house]].
